title: Everybody Wants To Rule The World

[intro] (Dmaj7-G) (G) x4

(Dmaj7)World (G)

(Dmaj7) (G)

(G)Nothing ever (F#m)lasts forever
(Em)Every(F#m)body (G)wants to (A)rule the…
 
(G) There's a room where the (D)light won't (A)find you

(G) So sad they (F#m)had to fade it

(Bm) (Bm) (C) (C)
(Bm) (Bm) (C) (C)
(G) (G) (A) (A)

(G) (G) (D) (A) x2

(Dmaj7)World (G)
